page.title: 20THE GRAY LADY
page.content:
There is a story in Branston about a lady ghost. She haunts the Old Hall. Many years ago a young house maid walked down to the lake in Branston Park.The men were taking the ice off the lake to freeze the meat. One man slipped,fell into the lake and drowned. When the lady arrived she found out that the man who had fallen in was her husband.She died of a broken heart. As a ghost she goes to the lake and cries for him. She is called the Gray Lady.
The information on these pages was collected by the children in Class One of Branston County Junior School.We would like to thank the people of Branston for all their help.
